thread.title: Van der Westhuizen hospitalized in critical condition | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Van der Westhuizen hospitalized in critical condition | Daily Mail Online

author: Tom Bassam For Mailonline
title: Van der Westhuizen hospitalized in critical condition | Daily Mail Online
text: South Africa legend Joost van der Westhuizen admitted to hospital in critical condition as he battles motor neurone disease Joost van der Westhuizen is regarded as one of the best scrum halves ever The South African has been confined to a wheelchair by motor neurone disease He is now in constant need of an oxygen machine to help him survive The J9 Foundation put out a statement saying Van der Westhuizen had been admitted to hospital and asking for 'respect for the families at the moment'
